block.p: FELD-Solomon. Died August 1. Beloved husband of Bebe Feld, loving father of Alan (Fran), Michael (Barbara), Rick (Randi), and Randy. Also, grandchildren Daniel, Rebecca, Aaron, David, Allison and Jonathan. Zionist and educator, principal of the Solomon Feld Religious School at Wantagh Jewish Center. Services at 1PM, today August 3, at the Wantagh Jewish Center, Wantagh, N.Y.
